Room.Name: Waterfront Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Waterfront Way, north of the Civilian Farm Residences.
Room.LongDescription: The Farmers, being one of the most powerful lobbying groups, somehow got the city to allow them to build their own, individual houses near the farm lands. On the north side of the road is the Klondike Wheat Fields, where the wheat and grain for the entire city is grown.
